summary: A dying mob boss hands over his business to an old friend, Fernand. The boss' assistants want to get rid of the latter. But are the Volfoni brothers and Théo real threats? Ensuing fights and shootouts are more comical than deadly.
cast: Lino Ventura|Bernard Blier|Francis Blanche|Claude Rich|Pierre Bertin|Robert Dalban|Jean Lefebvre|Horst Frank|Charles Regnier|Mac Ronay|Venantino Venantini|Sabine Sinjen|Jacques Dumesnil|Yves Arcanel|Philippe Castelli|Henri Cogan|Dominique Davray|Charles Lavialle|Annie Marescot|Paul Mercey|Georges Nojaroff|Marcel Bernier|Jean-Louis Castelli|Beatrice Delfe|Jean-Michel Derot|Jean Luisi|Paul Meurisse|Jean-Pierre Moutier
title: Gángster a la fuerza
